channel.title: 2 Questions, Should Be easy
channel.description:
Ok if you read this, thanks for trying to help, if u cant help, oh well, and if u can GREAT
1. I have a skilling server and some people want a pking server, I have 2 edited sources and i am running the skilling atm, and i also want to run the pking one, how do i do that and i can run the pking 1 on port 5555 but idk how to do that.
2. I have a DDOS problem, people try to crash my server with dumbass names like 83748374387 and spam 500 accounts and just go crazy.. and they also spam text, but their loss, i get their ip when they do so, so if you could help me do that to their server (like tell me how to do it back) that would be great.
If u dont get a reply here, add me on msn Pwn_Zor@hotmail.com

item.title: 2 Questions, Should Be easy
item.dc:creator: @nullpkz nullpkz
item.description:
@nullpkz wrote:

how do i make a limit of 3 ips then after that it auto ips?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 07:57:43 pm[/size][hr]and when i try to run my server on port 5555 and i changed the source to make it 5555 but do i also have to change the client aswell :[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 07:58:18 pm[/size][hr]and does anybody know of a good 508 ip changer where they can change the port aswell so they dont have to download 2 at a time? or even a good 317 pking source?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions, Should Be easy
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:7, topic:300107”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=396385.msg2944059#msg2944059 date=1252102593]
You shouldn’t have to change the ports.

You copy a client, change the port of one to 43954, and the other to 5555.
Release, port forward the ports, and run the servers.

It’s not entirely difficult…
[/quote]
You just said: “You shouldn’t have to change the ports.” then went on to say about changing the ports. Lol.

Ontopic: Server.java[/quote]

You shouldn’t HAVE to…
If I’m wrong, then I was rambling on. Headaches

Read full topic

item.description:

Still unresolved, idk how to run a port 5555 (i know how to do the port forwarding but not that client etc) and how do i make it so it like auto bans if sum1 logs into accounts with the same ip 3 times or something

item.title: 2 Questions, Should Be easy
item.dc:creator: @sparkz2k7 sparkz2k7
item.description:
@sparkz2k7 wrote:

  1. Making Two Ports is always going to be the most efficient way of running two servers.

  2. Anti-SYI or a Character per I.P Limit is the best option =)

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions, Should Be easy
item.dc:creator: @nullpkz nullpkz
item.description:
@nullpkz wrote:

Haha yeah this is my new account, i have 12 rep on my other account Woodcutguy :\

But if i do the 1 ip only… then people wont be able to log into my second server aswell?

And Idk how to change the ports so people can log on the 5555 and the 43594[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 04, 2009, 04:16:14 pm[/size][hr]also… i didnt find any scripts in the seach for antisyi scripts… because most people dont use anything with syi in their name its usslaly 82382732

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions, Should Be easy
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

  1. Idk. Just use two ports, simple as that? Make sure they’re both port forwarded.
  2. Use an AntiSYI code, and/or, use a limitconnections code.

–Before you ask for the codes, use the search bar, first-time-poster-dude.

Read full topic
